alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 7:17PM EDT until April 04 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Highlands County in south central Florida... Southeastern Polk County in central Florida... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 716 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Avon Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... River Ranch and Indian Lake Estates. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
